items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Say YES to this dress!
items.body: This dress made me feel absolutely gorgeous! The fit was perfectâ€”comfortable, flattering, and it accentuated my curves beautifully. For reference, Iâ€™m 5â€™2â€ and 140 lbs. One thing to note: the dress is very long. Even wearing 6-inch stilettos, it still brushed the ground, so itâ€™s definitely tall-girl friendly. The sparkle is bright, beautiful, and noticeable across the room. It truly catches the light, and I received so many compliments all night. Overall, I would say YES to this dress a million times overâ€”stunning and absolutely worth it! Read more
items.author: Mariah Ingle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Perfect!!
items.body: I purchased this dress to wear at my daughterâ€™s wedding. It fit perfectly and was long enough. Iâ€™m 5â€™10â€ tall and itâ€™s often difficult to find clothing long enough. This dress was perfect and it was soft and looked beautiful! It flowed so well when I walked!! I received so many compliments! Most of all, the price was right!!!! Read more
items.author: Mikki

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and classy!
items.body: This dress was more than I dreamed. It was stretchy and comfy and fit me well. The fabric was not heavy at all even with all the bling. I received many compliments. It sparkled beautifully. It was a steal for the quality and fit. Read more
items.author: Lori Martin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and elegant!!
items.body: Very nice dress. Stretchy, but snug fit. True to size. Iâ€™m 5â€™0 and 160lbs, so a medium fit fine. The ruffle layers up top are a little hard, but not to uncomfortable. Read more
items.author: Who Dat Nation!!!

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous and sexy
items.body: True to size. I wore this for my son's wedding in Vegas and got so many compliments. I got 4 dresses from Amazon and 2 from department stores but ended if wearing this one. I am 5 foot 4 and it was a little long with 2 in heals but still looked gorgeous. It also gave a great shape and form fitting gorgeous. I am 185lbs, 40 DDD and got a XL. Read more
items.author: Homeira Petok

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The stretch velvet black sequins looks high end
items.body: I LOVE this dress! It's very flattering and I HIGHLY recommend it. The picture doesn't do it justice. It's stretch velvet sequins is a great quality and gave it a high end look. It was perfect for the Gala I attended. It's runs true to size. I'm 5'7' and weigh 161 lbs and ordered a large and with 2 inch kitten heels I didn't have to hem or alter the dress. The left arm was a little snug(I'm left handed), but it spite of this, the style was flattering on my arms and made them look fabulous. Read more
items.author: Pamela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Dress
items.body: This dress is stunning! I bought it for a Gala. Itâ€™s a perfect length, you donâ€™t need to worry about stepping on your own dress. It is comfortable & elegant. It drapes perfectly across the side of your shoulders. It is a thin velvet material with sequins. Sometimes when you wear sequin gowns they scratch your skin. I no issues with the sequins at all. Iâ€™m so happy with this dress that I went back to see what other colors I can order it in. Perfect edition for your closet you can wear this for many different occasions! Iâ€™m 5 8 and about 160 & 36DD I bought a large fit well! Read more
items.author: Such beautiful shoes. Better than the pictures!

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can I give it more than 5 stars?
items.body: This dress is amazing. Plenty of stretch, plenty of sparkle. I was the bell of the ball. This was perfect for the black tie event that I needed it for. I was pleasantly surprised to find that the neckline was pretty modest for an off the shoulder dress which makes it very "larger bust" friendly. Hugged my curves without restricting movement. Sequins stayed in place all night! I wear a size 16 and a XXL was perfect for me. Long enough to wear with heels (mine were 2.5 inch high) but not so long that I had to worry about any fabric trailing behind me and getting stepped on. I can't think of a single drawback. Read more
items.author: Maggiesbj

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Off Shoulder Evening Maxi Formal Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Off Shoulder Evening Maxi Formal Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Silver-peacock Flower, Apricot Bamboo Leaf, Black, Blue-multicolored Gold, Balck-multicolored, Light Green Bamboo Leaf, Black Silver, Green Arc Gold, Wine Red-multicolored Gold, Purple-multicolored Gold, Gold, Green Bamboo Leaf, Blue, Black-multicolored Gold. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
